attributes.action: Exclude International students from Hotel quarantine or Bear the cost by Govt
attributes.additional_details:
Our request is either exclude students from huge costed hotel quarantine or bear the cost by government and universities. Moreover the online classes are not worth towards the fee charged by the universities. The major reasons to get exclusion are, 
1. Many international students paid huge fee to the universities
2. International students are contributing to UK's economy.
3. Students are not getting enough exploruture from online learning. 
universities.
So exclusion is required immediately.
attributes.background: Exclude students and their families from hotel quarantine in UK is getting stronger.Because  from may 17th onwards the universities are opening. Apart from this students have already paid huge amount of fee to the universities. Spending hotel quarantine cost can not be affordable by students.
